    • createEnvelopedSignature

      public Document createEnvelopedSignature​(Document root, String reference_id, Element target_elem, Element insert_elem) throws IOException

      Creates an enveloped XML signature. If target_elem != null then the signature is inserted there else it is inserted at the end of the document.

      Parameters:
      root - Top node of document to be signed.
      reference_id - The mandatory ID element.
      target_elem - Where the top element is (null = element root).
      insert_elem - Where the Signature is to be inserted (null = element root).
      Returns:
      "root" as is.
      Throws:
      IOException - If anything unexpected happens...

    • createEnvelopedSignature

      public Document createEnvelopedSignature​(Document root, String reference_id) throws IOException

      Creates an enveloped XML signature at the end of the document.

      Parameters:
      root - Top node of document to be signed.
      reference_id - The mandatory ID element.
      Returns:
      "root" as is.
      Throws:
      IOException - If anything unexpected happens...

    • createEnvelopedSignature

      public Document createEnvelopedSignature​(XMLEnvelopedInput param) throws IOException

      Creates an enveloped XML signature.

      Parameters:
      param - A descriptor.
      Returns:
      Root to signed XML document.
      Throws:
      IOException - If anything unexpected happens...

    • signXMLWrapper

      public XMLSignatureWrapper signXMLWrapper​(XMLObjectWrapper document, String object_id) throws IOException

      Creates an (enveloping) XML signature.

      Parameters:
      document - The XML object to be signed.
      object_id - An ID attribute that limits the scope
      Returns:
      XML signature.
      Throws:
      IOException - If anything unexpected happens...

    • signXMLWrapper

      public XMLSignatureWrapper signXMLWrapper​(XMLObjectWrapper document) throws IOException

      Creates an (enveloping) XML signature.

      Parameters:
      document - The XML object to be signed.
      Returns:
      XML signature.
      Throws:
      IOException - If anything unexpected happens...
